config.Name: lua
config.code:
cb_filter=require('calyptia.pr')([====================[[{"type":"parse","opts":{"src":"log","dst":"parsed","regex":"(?<future_use1>[^,]+),(?<receive_time>[^,]+),(?<serial_number>[^,]+),(?<type>CORRELATION),(?<content>[^,]+),(?<future_use2>[^,]+),(?<generated_time>[^,]+),(?<source_address>[^,]+),(?<source_user>[^,]+),(?<virtual_system>[^,]+),(?<category>[^,]+),(?<severity>[^,]+),(?<device_group_hierarchy_level_1>[^,]+),(?<device_group_hierarchy_level_2>[^,]+),(?<device_group_hierarchy_level_3>[^,]+),(?<device_group_hierarchy_level_4>[^,]+),(?<virtual_system_name>[^,]+),(?<device_name>[^,]+),(?<virtual_system_id>[^,]+),(?<object_name>[^,]+),(?<object_id>[^,]+),(?<evidence>.+)","regexEngine":"pcre2"},"comment":"PAN Correlation v10","id":"e19c0124-19cf-4695-82da-20892e380779","active":true},{"type":"flatten","opts":{"key":"parsed","regex":"^.+$","keyReplacement":"%1","keepOrig":false},"comment":"","id":"75f3e442-a251-490d-80be-d3a95a82763e","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the value is empty
        if v == '' then
            -- delete the key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end






"},"comment":"remove all keys that have empty values","id":"fe010bc5-0459-4b7b-966e-a6696172bd76","active":true},{"type":"block_keys","opts":{"regex":"month|day|http|log|csv|time|future_use","matchCase":false,"regexEngine":"pcre2","nestedPath":""},"comment":"remove original event and wrapper","id":"daf7b885-10f8-41e9-b137-2b2c2e8d8dbb","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "source") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("source", "src")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end

    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "destination") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("destination", "dest")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end

    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "virtual") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("virtual", "vrt")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end

    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "system") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("system", "sys")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end

    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "application") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("application", "app")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the key contains "source"
        if string.match(k, "packets") ~= nil then
            -- rename the key
            record[k:gsub("packets", "pkts")] = v
            -- delete the old key
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
  
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"Rename fields that contain "source" to "src"","id":"c1f967d7-21ff-4d09-96cb-597a9fe839c0","active":true},{"type":"block_keys","opts":{"regex":"src_country|dst_country|action_flags|rule_uuid","matchCase":false,"regexEngine":"pcre2","nestedPath":""},"comment":"","id":"61a72d39-f5d4-4cb7-97f7-412bd4379eb7","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    for k, v in pairs(record) do
        -- check if the value is "0"
        if v == "0" then
            -- delete the field
            record[k] = nil
        end
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if field value is "0" then remove the field","id":"2908b07f-c20e-4853-bf2d-bfd675c45a75","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    -- check if Tunnel_Type is equal to "N/A"
    if record['tunnel_type'] == 'N/A' then
        -- delete Tunnel_Type
        record['tunnel_type'] = nil
        -- delete Tunnel_ID
        record['tunnel_id'] = nil
        -- delete Tunneled_app
        record['tunneled_app'] = nil
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if Tunnel_Type has the value "N/A" then delete Tunnel_Type and Tunnel_ID fields","id":"5318c192-b44f-402d-ada1-c4d52b558353","active":true},{"type":"custom_script","opts":{"script":"return function(tag, ts, record)
    -- check if app_Subcategory is equal to app_Category
    if record['app_subcategory'] == record['app_category'] then
        -- delete app_Subcategory
        record['app_subcategory'] = nil
    end
    return 1, ts, record
end"},"comment":"if app_Subcategory is equal to app_Category then delete app_Subcategory","id":"848effb9-958b-4879-bd04-745ee0e53e00","active":true}]]====================])
